title.rendered: “Remembering IDF Hero Amichai Israel Joshua Oster: Updates on Fallen and Injured Soldiers from Recent Gaza Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesman regarding the name of an IDF casualty whose notification has been delivered to his family:
https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC010120240890183084

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where details and pictures of the fallen are published and updated:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In the battle where Staff Sergeant (reserve) Amichai Israel Joshua Oster tragically fell, two reserve fighters from Battalion 7020, ‘Sharon’ Brigade (5), were seriously injured.

In addition, a reserve fighter in the Engineering Battalion 8219, ‘Half of the Fire’ Brigade (551), was seriously injured in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

Also, an officer in the Military Engineering School got severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

The wounded soldiers were evacuated for medical treatment in a hospital, their families have been updated.
